name: Upsync Downbeat
description:
Bringing some world music conception into my productions, I create this composition to be simulated into an 3D oscilloscope, creating some visual effects for what your ears hear.

[An oscilloscope is a way of representing in 3D the sound heard, bringing an immersiveness to this objkt, as it amplifies for the eyes what the ears hear]

44.1khz - wav
